features.name: Basic Arithmetic Operations
features.description: Implement core calculator functions for add, subtract, multiply, and divide

user_stories.content: As a developer, I want to perform basic arithmetic operations so that I can calculate simple expressions
acceptance_criteria: Can divide two numbers with zero division protection

features.name: CLI Interface
features.description: Create command-line interface for interactive calculator usage

user_stories.content: As a user, I want to interact with the calculator through command-line so that I can perform calculations without GUI
acceptance_criteria: Can start calculator in interactive mode
Can input operations and see results

user_stories.content: As a user, I want to see my calculation history so that I can review previous operations
acceptance_criteria: History stores all calculations in session

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Robust error handling for invalid inputs and operations

user_stories.content: As a user, I want clear error messages so that I can understand and fix input mistakes
acceptance_criteria: Shows error for division by zero
Shows error for invalid number format
